metadata.title: CVE-2017-11605 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: There is a heap based buffer over-read in LibSass 3.4.5, related to address0xb4803ea1. A crafted input will lead to a remote denial of service attack.

criterions.comment: libsass: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
